body_html:
I ran into the same issue, with the difference being I compiled bazel 0.4.5 from source. Also compiling for a p100, using CUDA compute capability 6.0 as per specifications.

All other info is the same as @mckinziebrandon.

Switching to branch r1.1 seems to fix the issue for me (head at a23f5d7).

body:
I ran into the same issue, with the difference being I compiled bazel 0.4.5 from source. Also compiling for a p100, using CUDA compute capability 6.0 as per specifications.  

All other info is the same as @mckinziebrandon. 

Switching to branch r1.1 seems to fix the issue for me (head at a23f5d7).
